1651100.name: 16bit vs Reality Soundtrack
1651100.description:
The official soundtrack for 16bit vs Reality consist of 14 hard rock guitar compositions capturing the energetic and intense mood of the game. The rocking tracks composed exclusively for the game were rearranged into a chiptune versions in a 16bit console sound style.

But!
With this album you get 2 versions of each track: the in-game chiptune style and an ultra-awesome instrumental version recorded and arranged by the author himself. Plus complimentary 16bit vs Reality desktop wallpaper and some of the concept-art showing you the
long journey the game made during it's production.

If you like oldschool tunes from the 16bit console era or powerful exciting hard rock music then 16bit vs Reality Soundtrack is for you!
